name: Mixed Feelings (avariengien, anitaptap, redsto, guilhemn, CozyFractal)
name_original: Mixed Feelings (avariengien, anitaptap, redsto, guilhemn, CozyFractal)
description:
Discover the world living in the leaves lying on the floor of a mysterious forest. Use your planning skills to gather seeds and change their color to adapt to the emotion of your customers. Be kind, listen well. It feels good to be empathic.

And remember: everyone is weird and that's fine!
